review_title: Do not ever work for this company
pros: Some of the team, not any other pro's to this role!!
cons:
No appreciation shown whatsoever
No Incentives to motivate you as an employee
Poor office environment - Extremely uncomfortable chairs, air con blowing at its coldest throughout winter, desk set up is extremely poor!!
No freedom to speak with Management
No HR department to consult with about any issues in the workplace
Illegal and unsociable working hours (some days not even 12 hrs between shifts which is against the law!)
A sales advisor sells courses at £20,000 you receive no commission and not even a thank you for your hard work.
